Class ClientGUI

public class ClientGUI extends Client
Implementation of the graphical user interface client

    • getFrame

      public JFrame getFrame()
      Gets the main program frame
      Returns:
      The main program frame

    • sendMessageAsync

      private void sendMessageAsync(Message msg)
      Sends a message to the server on another thread. If the message cannot be sent due to a network error, stop the game and display an error.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to send to the server

    • run

      public void run()
      Initialize the client: open the main frame and ask for server IP and port
      Specified by:
      run in class Client

    • processMessage

      public void processMessage(Message msg)
      This method is called in the Event Dispatcher Thread by the socketWorker whenever a new server messages is available.
      Parameters:
      msg - The new server message to process

    • handleCharacter

      private void handleCharacter()
      Determine if there are characters that the player can play. If so, ask the player which character to play and ask for the required parameters to make the move.

    • askCharacterParameters

      private void askCharacterParameters(int characterId)
      Asks the player the parameters required to play the character with the given id
      Parameters:
      characterId - The character ID (0-12)

    • askCharacterParameters

      private void askCharacterParameters(Character c)
      Asks the player the parameters required to play the given character

    • finalMessage

      private void finalMessage(String message)
      Display a final message on the screen and a button to close the program. Free all resources (socket worker, socket, threads)
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display on the screen (e.g. "Game over")

    • closeSilent

      private static void closeSilent(Closeable c)
      Helper method to close an object without raising exceptions
      Parameters:
      c - The object to close
